hero.title:
Justice with Compassion.
Support at Every Step.
hero.subtitle: We advocate for a fairer legal system, ensuring that every individual receives compassionate and competent support throughout the criminal legal process.
hero.imageAlt: Advocates holding signs for social justice
main.title: Advocates for Social Justice Reform
whoWeAre.heading: Together, we're building a fairer and more humane justice system.
whoWeAre.description1: Advocates for Social Justice Reform (ASJR) is a volunteer-run coalition dedicated to transforming the criminal legal system in Travis County.
whoWeAre.description2: We work to ensure that every person receives fair representation, compassionate support, and dignity at every step of the process.
whoWeAre.imageAlt1: Advocates for Social Justice Reform team members smiling
whoWeAre.imageAlt2: Advocates for Social Justice Reform team members at a protest
values.education.title: Education
values.education.description: To educate ourselves and our communities about social justice issues.
values.communication.title: Communication
values.communication.description: To educate ourselves and our communities about social justice issues.
values.advocacy.title: Advocacy
values.advocacy.description: To be a voice of change in community forums.
values.collaboration.title: Collaboration
values.collaboration.description: To listen to and collaborate with stakeholders representing diverse viewpoints.
values.oversight.title: Oversight & Evaluate
values.oversight.description: To educate ourselves and our communities about social justice issues.
programs.heading: From court to community, creating lasting change.
programs.cafa.title: CAFA (Counsel at First Appearance)
programs.cafa.description: Everyone deserves a lawyer from their very first court appearance.
programs.cafa.imageAlt: A lawyer meeting with a client at a desk, representing legal counsel at a first court appearance.
programs.publicDefender.title: Public Defender Office Support
programs.publicDefender.description: We collaborate with public defender offices to strengthen representation for indigent clients.
programs.publicDefender.imageAlt: Public defenders working in a busy law library, symbolizing support for indigent defense offices.
programs.policeOversight.title: Police Oversight & Accountability
programs.policeOversight.description: Promoting transparency and community oversight to ensure fair policing practices.
programs.policeOversight.imageAlt: Police officers standing during a community oversight activity, representing transparency and accountability in policing.
programs.earlyCaseReview.title: Early Case Review & Diversion
programs.earlyCaseReview.description: Identifying options before trial-dismissal, diversion, or reduced charges-to reduce unnecessary incarceration.
programs.earlyCaseReview.imageAlt: A courtroom scene with attorneys and a judge, illustrating early case review and diversion opportunities.
programs.communityPower.title: Community Power Support
programs.communityPower.description: We help families understand the legal process and actively support their loved ones as part of the defense team.
programs.communityPower.imageAlt: Advocates for Social Justice Reform team members smiling together with a police officer.
programs.rightsEducation.title: Rights Education & Advocacy
programs.rightsEducation.description: Educating our community about legal rights, system navigation, and advocacy strategies.
programs.rightsEducation.imageAlt: A classroom-style workshop with a presenter and attendees, representing legal rights education and advocacy training
news.heading: Latest News
news.description1: Explore the latest updates from ASJR and see how we're working for change.
news.description2: Learn about our ongoing advocacy efforts, community partnerships, and the progress we're making together toward a more just and compassionate legal system.
news.imageAlt: Advocates for Social Justice Reform team members smiling together with a police officer.
